info.name: GymBite Backend API v3.3.0 - Complete Collection
info.description:
Complete API collection for GymBite - AI-powered fitness management platform

**Features:**
- 50+ Endpoints across 11 modules
- Firebase Authentication
- Role-based Access Control (Client/Trainer/Admin)
- Push Notifications via FCM
- Real-time Analytics

**Base URLs:**
- Production: https://gymbite-backend.vercel.app/api
- Local: http://localhost:3000/api

**Latest Updates (v3.3.0 - Nov 10, 2025):**
- Notifications: Added dashboard endpoints for targeted notifications
  - Send to single user: `/notifications/send-to-user/:userId`
  - Send to role: `/notifications/send-to-role/:role`
  - Broadcast to all: `/notifications/send/broadcast`
- Enhanced notification templates and types

**Previous Updates (v3.2.0 - Nov 6, 2025):**
- Progress API: Simplified request schema (auto-generates BMI and progressDate)
- Dashboard integration optimized

**Version:** 3.3.0
**Last Updated:** November 10, 2025

Create new appointment with v3.0.0 enum types
Get all progress records for a client
Get progress summary for a client

Create new progress record

**Request Fields:**
- clientId (required): Client ID
- weight (required): Weight in kg
- bodyFat (optional): Body fat percentage
- muscleMass (optional): Muscle mass in kg
- notes (optional): Progress notes

**Auto-Generated by Backend:**
- progressDate: Current timestamp
- BMI: Calculated from weight (using default height 1.7m)
- workoutPerformance: Maps from bodyFat + muscleMass
- mealPlanCompliance: Maps from notes

**Example Response:**
```json
{
  "id": 1,
  "clientId": 1,
  "weight": "75.5",
  "BMI": "26.12456747404845",
  "progressDate": "2025-11-06T17:56:06.897Z",
  "workoutPerformance": "Body Fat: 18.5%, Muscle Mass: 55.2kg",
  "mealPlanCompliance": "Feeling stronger, energy levels up",
  "createdAt": "2025-11-06T17:56:06.902Z"
}
```

Update progress record

**Updatable Fields:**
- weight: Weight in kg
- bodyFat: Body fat percentage
- muscleMass: Muscle mass in kg
- notes: Progress notes

**Note:** BMI is recalculated automatically when weight is updated
Get all notifications for a user
Mark all user notifications as read

**Dashboard Endpoint**: Send notification to a specific user by userId

**Request Body:**
- `title` (required, max 60 chars): Notification title
- `message` (required, max 240 chars): Notification message
- `notificationType` (optional): WORKOUT, MEAL, APPOINTMENT, PROGRESS, MESSAGE, ANNOUNCEMENT, INFO, WARNING, REMINDER

**Response:**
```json
{
  "notification": {
    "id": 1,
    "userId": 1,
    "message": "Your trainer has assigned...",
    "notificationType": "WORKOUT",
    "status": "UNREAD",
    "createdAt": "2025-11-10T10:15:28.000Z"
  },
  "pushSent": true
}
```

**Dashboard Endpoint**: Send notification to all users with a specific role

**URL Parameter:**
- `role`: CLIENT, TRAINER, or ADMIN

**Request Body:**
- `title` (required, max 60 chars): Notification title
- `message` (required, max 240 chars): Notification message
- `notificationType` (optional): WORKOUT, MEAL, APPOINTMENT, PROGRESS, MESSAGE, ANNOUNCEMENT, INFO, WARNING, REMINDER

**Response:**
```json
{
  "created": 5,
  "pushSent": {
    "successCount": 5,
    "failureCount": 0
  },
  "role": "TRAINER"
}
```

**Dashboard Endpoint**: Broadcast notification to ALL users in the system

**Request Body:**
- `title` (required, max 60 chars): Notification title
- `message` (required, max 240 chars): Notification message
- `notificationType` (optional, default: ANNOUNCEMENT): WORKOUT, MEAL, APPOINTMENT, PROGRESS, MESSAGE, ANNOUNCEMENT, INFO, WARNING, REMINDER

**Response:**
```json
{
  "created": 15,
  "pushSent": {
    "successCount": 12,
    "failureCount": 3
  }
}
```

**Use Cases:**
- System-wide announcements
- Platform updates
- Emergency notifications
- Maintenance alerts
